initialConnectionComplete.message: The device has now been registred as known

unReadableData.message: The data could not be parsed as JSON

missingFunctionOfData.message: The function of the data could not be understood

missingDeviceType.message: The device type was not included

missingDeviceId.message: The device ID was not included

missingProperties.message: No device properties could be found

incorrectProperties.message: Some properties where either missing or was not of the right type
